* **High probability of high quality:** The statistics show 3 out of 5 products sold were high quality. This is a 60% success rate, suggesting a good chance the current product is also high quality.

* **Potential reward outweighs risk:** Even if the product turns out to be low quality, the potential gain of a high-quality product at a good price makes the risk worth taking.
